sentences.en: Bank industry has great centrality and demonstrates the characteristics of imperfect competition.
sentences.cn: 国内银行业集中度较高,具有垄断竞争的市场特征.

sentences.en: In his own writings Obama stresses the centrality of his father not only to his beliefs and values but to his very identity.
sentences.cn: 在自己的著作中，奥巴马强调父亲的中心地位不仅在于其信仰和价值观，还在于对他的极大认同。

sentences.en: Meanwhile, Ezra Klein notes centrality of cars doesn't bode well for pricing carbon.
sentences.cn: 同时, 艾兹拉?克莱因(EzraKlein)注意到,“汽车仍为消费回落,对碳定价来说,并非预示着好兆头. ”

sentences.en: Occurrence centrality of the meeting after why taking hormone is fat?
sentences.cn: 为什么服用激素后会出现向心性肥胖?

sentences.en: Our bodies have no centrality either.
sentences.cn: 我们的身体也没有中心。

sentences.en: Our bodies have no centrality either.
sentences.cn: 我们的身体也同样没有中心。

sentences.en: The outcome of analysis shows that the proper share centrality vails the efficiency of corporate governance.
sentences.cn: 实证结果表明适度集中的股权结构有利于上市公司的治理效率.

sentences.en: To strengthen protection, we must reassert the centrality of international humanitarian and human rights law.
sentences.cn: 为了加强保护, 我们必须重申国际人道主义和人权法的核心地位.

sentences.en: With the advent of global ecological crisis, human centrality becomes the focus of discussion.
sentences.cn: 随着全球性的生态危机威胁到人类的生存和发展, 对人类中心主义的讨论成为热点.

trans.tran_en: the state or condition of being central
